title: BRIEF-Stella-Jones Announces The Appointment Of Eric Vachon As President And CEO
text:
BRIEF-Stella-Jones Announces The Appointment Of Eric Vachon As President And CEO

Stock Markets 33 minutes ago (Sep 12, 2019 07:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Stella-Jones Announces The Appointment Of Eric Vachon As President And CEO Sept 12 (Reuters) - Stella-Jones Inc : * STELLA-JONES INC. ANNOUNCES THE APPOINTMENT OF ERIC VACHON AS PRESIDENT AND CEO * STELLA-JONES INC - VACHON'S APPOINTMENT WILL TAKE EFFECT ON OCTOBER 11, 2019, SUCCEEDING BRIAN MCMANUS * STELLA-JONES INC - CONCURRENTLY, VACHON WILL BE JOINING COMPANY'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS

BRIEF-Stella-Jones Announces The Appointment Of Eric Vachon As President And CEO
description: BRIEF-Stella-Jones Announces The Appointment Of Eric Vachon As President And CEO
